member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.TestFramework.ReferenceDlls.MsCorLib
member.summary: Test project will have reference to the MsCorLib assembly of the test's platform. It's an error if mscorlib is not defined for that platform.

member.name: T:JetBrains.TestFramework.Projects.TestProjectHasClrImpl
member.summary: The component is used for platform tests to make the tests behaviour intact. This is necessary because we have no PSI in platform tests. The component must be overriden in PSI Tests.
